CustomField.description: Status of the group member record: 1. Request Submitted - group member has requested to join a private group. 2. Active - group member has been added to a group. 3. Request Declined - group member has been rejected upon request to join a private group. 4. Deactivated - group member has been deactivated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Status of the group member record: 1. Request Submitted - requested to join a private group. 2. Active - added to a group. 3. Request Declined - rejected upon request to join a private group. 4. Deactivated - deactivated.
CustomField.label: Status
